Detailed Description

Struct for statistics.

All the statistics from the nRouted are stored in nRdstat_t struct.

Todo:
The macros for manipulating the statistics struct are implmented but not used anywhere -mjs

Field Documentation

Total bytes received (TCP and serial).

long int nRdstat_t::bytes_sent
 

Total bytes sent (TCP and serial).

int nRdstat_t::connections_dropped
 

Total number of TCP connections that were dropped.

int nRdstat_t::get_config_packets_sent
 

Number of get_config packets that have been sent to the serial device.

int nRdstat_t::malformed_packets_serial
 

Number of malformed packets that have been received by the serial server.

int nRdstat_t::malformed_packets_tcp
 

Number of malformed packets that have been received by the TCP server.

int nRdstat_t::packets_from_serial
 

Number of packets that have been received by the serial server.

int nRdstat_t::packets_from_tcp
 

Number of packets that have been received by the TCP server.

int nRdstat_t::set_config_packets_sent
 

Number of set_config packets that have been sent to the serial device.

int nRdstat_t::tcp_connections
 

Total number of TCP connections that the server has accepted.

Number of open TCP connections.
